name: Catacombs of Infinity
description: Catacombs of Infinity is a text-based RPG where you fight endless hordes of enemies that fight you one at a time. Attacking the enemy or healing yourself is up to you. See how many enemies you can defeat. The enemy class is random so you'll either get the same enemy again or a different enemy class  to fight. Remember to turn CAPS LOCK on when the fight begins as this is your only hope of getting through the catacombs.
